{
    "number": 69764,
    "data": "89,773,3611,12179,33349,78889,167383,326471,595409,1027949,1695539,2690843,4131581,6164689,8970799,12769039,17822153,24441941,32995019,43908899,57678389,74872313,96140551,122221399,153949249,192262589,238212323",
    "name": "Frobenius number of the numerical semigroup generated by consecutive octahedral numbers.",
    "comment": [
        "The Frobenius number of a numerical semigroup generated by relatively prime integers a_1,...,a_n is the largest positive integer that is not a nonnegative linear combination of a_1,...,a_n. Since consecutive octahedral numbers are relatively prime, they generate a numerical semigroup with a Frobenius number. The Frobenius number of a 2-generated semigroup <a,b> has the formula ab-a-b."
    ],
    "reference": [
        "R. Froberg, C. Gottlieb and R. Haggkvist, \"On numerical semigroups\", Semigroup Forum, 35 (1987), 63-83 (for definition of Frobenius number)."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Harvey P. Dale, <a href=\"/A069764/b069764.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000</a>",
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec#order_07\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (7, -21, 35, -35, 21, -7, 1)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n)=((1/3)n(2n^2+1)-1)((1/3)(n+1)(2(n+1)^2+1)-1)-1.",
        "G.f.: x^2*(89+150*x+69*x^2+20*x^3-13*x^4+6*x^5-x^6)/(1-x)^7. [Colin Barker, Feb 12 2012]",
        "a(2)=89, a(3)=773, a(4)=3611, a(5)=12179, a(6)=33349, a(7)=78889, a(8)=167383, a(n)=7*a(n-1)-21*a(n-2)+35*a(n-3)-35*a(n-4)+ 21*a(n-5)- 7*a(n-6)+a(n-7). - _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 19 2015"
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(2)=89 because 89 is not a nonnegative linear combination of 6 and 19 (the second and third octahedral numbers), but all integers greater than 89 are."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "FrobeniusNumber/@Partition[Rest[Table[(n(2n^2+1))/3,{n,30}]],2,1] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{7,-21,35,-35,21,-7,1},{89,773,3611,12179,33349,78889,167383},30] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 19 2015 *)"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A005900, A037165, A059769, A069755-A069763."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "2,1",
    "author": "Victoria A Sapko (vsapko(AT)canes.gsw.edu), Apr 18 2002",
    "ext": [
        "More terms from _Carl Najafi_, Sep 10 2011"
    ],
    "references": 9,
    "revision": 15,
    "time": "2015-11-19T17:25:10-05:00",
    "created": "2003-05-16T03:00:00-04:00"
}
